game.name: Spearmen Hunters
game.description:
This time we have brought you an action-packed challenge that has unique background and amazing gameplay! Would you like to witness this highly engaging and addictive game environment? Join Spearman Hunters and get ready to play the role of a responsible and brave spearman hunter! Your objective in this brand new action game is to defeat all your enemies and save your tribe. The problem is that your opponents will keep coming to fight against you time to time. 
You as a spearman hunter have to eliminate as much enemies as you can to create your high score. Grab your spears and compete with other tribes to keep the domination of your homeland on your own in this HTML5 shooting game! Use the mouse to aim your target and do not forget to release LMB to throw your spear! Be careful and quick and try to avoid being hit! Make sure that you use your shield wisely to protect you against the attacks of other tribes. 
The number of platforms and enemies will increase as you progress in this cool throwing game. It takes lots of time to destroy some enemy tribe members with shields. Get your player ready to face against some tribe members who are chiefs and know how to summon fireballs! Clear level, earn coins and do not forget to use those coins to buy new upgrades including improved spears and shields in this spear hunting game! Good luck to finish all of the levels and wear the crown of a trial warrior legend!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Spearmen Hunters at atmegame.com ! We have selected this shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE TO AIM, RELESE TO SHOOT
